description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Early History of Illinois, from its discovery by the French, in 1673, until its cession to Great Britain in 1763, including the narrative of Marquette's discovery of the Mississippi. By S. Breese ... With a biographical memoir by Melville W. Fuller. Edited by Thomas Hoyne. [With maps and a portrait.]" Author: BREESE, Sidney. Contributor: FULLER, Melville W. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.f.6." Page: 327 Place of Publishing: Chicago Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: E. B. Myers & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000462553 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
